message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper deals with natural language processing and discourse relation recognition. 
2. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also likely as the paper proposes a novel memory mechanism to improve the performance of the implicit discourse relation recognizer. 
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning) is another possible category as the paper involves training a model to recognize implicit discourse relations. 
4. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper deals with the issue of data sparsity in the context of discourse relation recognition. 
5. cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a less likely category, but possible as the paper proposes a neural network-based model with a memory mechanism.
